channel.title: Process-PK.com | Take a look!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zLf76.png[/img]
[B]Links:[/B] [url=http://process-pk.com]Website[/url] | [url=http://www.process-pk.com/webclient.php]Webclient[/url] | [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/36288851/Process-PK%20%5BDESKTOP%20CLIENT%5D.rar]Download Client[/url]
[B]Information:[/B] Process-PK is owned and operated by Dan. I've spent countless amount of hours working on the server to make sure everything is near perfection. I'm hoping that all problems are at a minimum so players can have a fun and enjoyable experience. The main skills are all functional, I'm currently working on construction and making hunter more realistic. [b]I would really appericate it if you gave it ago[/b], I'm hoping that Process-PK will grow and be compared to the big servers sometime in the near-future.[/center]
[B]Forum Features:[/B]
[ul][li]Reliable and fast web hosting.[/li] [li]vBulletin Forums.[/li] [li]Updated frequently.[/li] [li]Easy to use.[/li] [li]Friendly staff and community.[/li] [li]Registered domain.[/li] [li]Clean and tidy.[/li][/ul]
[B]Server Features:[/B]
[ul][li]Functional magics.[/li] [li]Near-perfect combat.[/li] [li]Bug free mini-games.[/li] [li]Great training facilities.[/li] [li]Various PKing teleports.[/li] [li]All skills functional.[/li] [li]Realistic economy.[/li] [li]Active and friendly staff.[/li] [li]Items on death interface.[/li] [li]Curses working.[/li] [li]Working hand cannon w/ special.[/li] [li]Working EXP counter.[/li] [li]Auto donation system.[/li] [li]Vote for rewards system.[/li] [li]Player and NPC clipping in most regions.[/li] [li]Flawless switching.[/li] [li]New combat icons.[/li] [li]New hitmarks.[/li][/ul]
And more.
[center][B]Media:[/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U2fLG.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6AElq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fsBgv.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ttnHT.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SPgFV.png[/img]
Join today!

item.title: Process-PK.com | Take a look!
item.dc:creator: @RuneXero_Dan RuneXero_Dan
item.description:
@RuneXero_Dan wrote:

Ruby:

I think it’d make your RSPS more professional if you worked out a whole site rather than just forums :). It’s not that hard, even if you download one from a free template site it’s still better than nothing!

Indeed, I’ll see what I can do :rolleyes:

item.title: Process-PK.com | Take a look!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Loveandpower:

it’s emulous based

iirc still wL

and, JAGGRAB won’t work unless you have packed everything into their correct archives.

You could however, still use JAGGRAB to grab the main_file_cache# files and download the remaining files, sprites, animations, whatever is not packed, etc. (which would be sent from the server after the initial files have been ‘grabbed’), and depending on how many files that may be, it may not be worth the hassle or may take just as long downloading time!

Read full topic
